tweet: While we believe, unlike our colleagues across the aisle, that voting methods and election technology should not be federally mandated, we can agree that no one wants foreign interference in our elections. Election security should not be a partisan issue. #ElectionSecurity pic.twitter.com/NgCg9sJehZ

The Election Security Assistance Act: 
✅ Provides funding to update aging and at-risk election technology. 
✅ Grants security clearances to local officials to be notified of threats
✅ Increases security resources with programs like the Election Cyber Assistance Unit

“As the top Republican on the House Committee w/ jurisdiction over federal elections, securing elections is 1 of my most urgent priorities... That’s why I, along with my Republican colleagues on CHA, introduced H.R. 3412, the Election Security Assistance Act.” #ElectionSecurity

Ranking Member @RodneyDavis authored an op-ed for @Suntimes to demonstrate work being done by Republicans to ensure states remain in control of their elections with the federal government assisting states in securing their election systems. 
➡️ READ BELOW https://chicago.suntimes.com/2019/8/27/20833986/voting-security-russian-hacking-election-security-assistance-act-rodney-davis …

"Today's visit was all about not pushing under the rug the seriousness of a Russian intrusion here with the state of Illinois. It was actually to talk about the positive steps that have been done here in Illinois to make sure that never happens again." #ElectionSecurity

Ranking Member @RodneyDavis & Sangamon County Clerk Don Gray, who is on the board of advisors to the @EACgov, visited the Illinois State Board of Elections Office and received a briefing on the state's election cybersecurity defense, the Cyber Navigator program. #ElectionSecurity https://twitter.com/SJRbreaking/status/1166117008951382016 …

Republicans want to help states bolster their election security without implementing federal mandates or taking away states‘ Constitutional right to run their own elections. That’s why we introduced H.R. 3412, the Election Security Assistance Act. #ElectionSecurity pic.twitter.com/Qp4UiA0sL9
